page.title: 15LYME REGIS TOWN COUNCIL
page.content: Lyme Regis Town Council looks after and is in charge of various things in Lyme. Council and Committee meetings take place in the Guildhall. The different Committees are: Planning, Grounds and Gardens, Marine Theatre Management, Recreations, Publicity and Advertising, Finance and General Purposes. The Council consists of a Mayor, Town Clerk and Councillors. The Town Clerk is a full-time job while the others are all part time and are voted into their seats. The Mayor chairs the meetings. The Mayor has a special outfit as does the Clerk, for special occasions and ceromonies. The Clerk looks after the town by collecting the rent and telling councillors their positions. The councillors look after town property e.g. car park, mini golf, gardens and playing fields.
